name: diversely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that includes many different types of people or things: This is one of the most diversely populated cities in the country. We believe that our diversely educated management team gives the company a competitive advantage.
in a way that is different from other people or things: Individual citizens are diversely competent in the country's official languages. The funds may be diversely distributed at national and local level.
More examplesFewer examplesCompanies with large resources can invest diversely to protect themselves financially.We try to educate our students diversely, giving them access to many different areas and styles of learning.The city is diversely industrialized and manufactures many different products.The columns were carved diversely with all kinds of plants and animals.
